agent_purpose: Product recommendation with knowledge base search, missing product email tickets via Gmail, and conversation summary email delivery

result.summary: No industrial-grade 3D bioprinter found; product request ticket sent.

data.greeting: Thank you for your inquiry regarding an industrial-grade 3D bioprinter for tissue engineering.
clarifying_questions: Are there specific materials or tissue types you need the bioprinter to support?
Do you have any size or throughput requirements for the bioprinter?
data.next_steps: A product request ticket has been submitted to our catalog team for your bioprinter request. We will update you if it becomes available.
data.email_acknowledgment: A notification has been sent to our team regarding your requested product.
